title: New: Real Magic – The Trance
content:
Let’s roll out some cliche about the song title fitting the general mood of the track, and just get it over with.

Denver’s Real Magic aka Drew Englander is the latest name to stamp his authority on the blogosphere, and rightly so. The Trance is a vibrantly swirling number, drawing from cheesy 80’s pop and the more modern beat-orientated producers that have dominated the Internet of late.

strip me of worth, I’ve come back down, forget these words, I’m nothing now
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
